faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes. Foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You do not require Spanish residency or a visa for property purchases. Total acquisition costs typically range from 8-13% of the property price. Our team provides detailed cost breakdowns and connects you with English-speaking financial advisors for comprehensive planning.
